Body:
def grammar():
    return UnorderedGroup('a', 'b', 'c', sep=[',', ';']), EOF
parser = ParserPython(grammar, reduce_tree=False)
result = parser.parse('b , a, c')
assert result
result = parser.parse('b , c; a')
assert result
with pytest.raises(NoMatch):
    parser.parse('a, b c')
with pytest.raises(NoMatch):
    parser.parse('a, c: a')
with pytest.raises(NoMatch):
    parser.parse('a, b, b; c')
with pytest.raises(NoMatch):
    parser.parse('a, c')
